field.label: Customer Alias Management
field.comment: You can allow the customers to manage/delete their aliases in the their account.

field.label: Await Notification
field.comment: In some cases it may take a few seconds until the transaction is successfully authorized. When this option is enabled, the notification is awaited.

field.label: External Checkout: Guest Checkout
field.comment: When using an external checkout, the customer can either be asked to chose an option to authenticate (as guest, register or login) or he can always be checked out as guest. For the second option to work, guest checkout has to be enabled in magento.

field.label: Operation Mode
field.comment: You can switch between the different environments, by selecting the corresponding operation mode. The test environment can be found at https://pilot.datatrans.biz/.

field.label: Datatrans Test Merchant ID
field.comment: The test merchant id given by Datatrans. This merchant id is used for the test environment.

field.label: Datatrans Live Merchant ID
field.comment: The merchant id given by Datatrans. This merchant id is used for the live environment.

field.label: Security Level
field.comment: Select the security level you want to use. This value must correspond with the selected value in the back-end of Datatrans. Note: In case you use the mail and phone order (MoTo) or the recurring feature you have to set the security level in both account identically.

field.label: Sign Settlement Requests
field.comment: You can sign also the settlement requests to increase the security. This value must correspond with the setting in the backoffice of Datatrans. Note: In case you use the mail and phone order (MoTo) or the recurring feature you have to set this option in both account identically.

field.label: Sign of Test Account
field.comment: In case you use security level 1 or 2 you have to provide a sign. This sign can be found in the backend of Datatrans of your test account.

field.label: Sign 2 of Test Account
field.comment: In case you use security 2 you can activate a separate sign (sign2) for the request done by Datatrans to your server. In this field you can provide this second sign for your test account.

field.label: Sign of Live Account
field.comment: In case you use security level 1 or 2 you have to provide a sign. This sign can be found in the backend of Datatrans of your live account.

field.label: Sign 2 of Live Account
field.comment: In case you use security 2 you can activate a separate sign (sign2) for the request done by Datatrans to your server. In this field you can provide this second sign for your live account.

field.label: Transaction ID Prefix
field.comment: Here you can insert a transaction prefix. The prefix allows you to change the transaction number that is transmitted to Datatrans. The prefix must contain the tag {id}. It will then be replaced by the order number (e.g. name_{id}).

field.label: Shop ID
field.comment: Here you can define a Shop ID. This is only necessary if you wish to operate several shops with one Datatrans account. In order to use this module, an additional module is required.

field.label: Mobile Device Detection
field.comment: Datatrans can show a mobile device optimized payment page. Should the optimized payment page shown, in case the user has a tablet or a mobile device?

field.label: Liability Shift Behavior
field.comment: If no liability shift is given for a transaction, should the transaction be marked as uncertain?

field.label: Alias Manager Account
field.comment: Which account should be used for transactions done with the alias manager?

field.label: Datatrans Test MoTo Merchant ID
field.comment: The test merchant id given by Datatrans for mail and phone orders (MoTo) and for recurring payments. This merchant id is used for the test environment.

field.label: Datatrans Live MoTo Merchant ID
field.comment: The merchant id given by Datatrans for mail and phone orders (MoTo) payments. This merchant id is used for the live environment.

field.label: Sign of Test MoTo Account
field.comment: In case you use security level 1 or 2 you have to provide a sign. This sign can be found in the backend of Datatrans of your test account. This setting is used only for mail and phone orders (MoTo) payments.

field.label: Sign 2 of Test MoTo Account
field.comment: In case you use security 2 you can activate a separate sign (sign2) for the request done by Datatrans to your server. In this field you can provide this second sign for your test account. This setting is used only for mail and phone orders (MoTo) payments.

field.label: Sign of Live MoTo Account
field.comment: In case you use security level 1 or 2 you have to provide a sign. This sign can be found in the backend of Datatrans of your live account. This setting is used only for mail and phone orders (MoTo) payments.

field.label: Sign 2 of Live MoTo Account
field.comment: In case you use security 2 you can activate a separate sign (sign2) for the request done by Datatrans to your server. In this field you can provide this second sign for your live account.

field.label: Datatrans Test Recurring Merchant ID
field.comment: The test merchant id given by Datatrans for recurring payments. This merchant id is used for the test environment.

field.label: Datatrans Live Recurring Merchant ID
field.comment: The merchant id given by Datatrans for recurring payments. This merchant id is used for the live environment.

field.label: Sign of Test Recurring Account
field.comment: In case you use security level 1 or 2 you have to provide a sign. This sign can be found in the backend of Datatrans of your test account. This setting is used only for recurring payments.

field.label: Sign 2 of Test Recurring Account
field.comment: In case you use security 2 you can activate a separate sign (sign2) for the request done by Datatrans to your server. In this field you can provide this second sign for your test account. This setting is used only for recurring payments.

field.label: Sign of Live Recurring Account
field.comment: In case you use security level 1 or 2 you have to provide a sign. This sign can be found in the backend of Datatrans of your live account. This setting is used only for recurring payments.

field.label: Sign 2 of Live Recurring Account
field.comment: In case you use security 2 you can activate a separate sign (sign2) for the request done by Datatrans to your server. In this field you can provide this second sign for your live account.

field.label: Transaction Updates
field.comment: When the store is not available (network outage, server failure or any other outage), when the feedback of Datatrans is sent, then the transaction state is not updated. Hence no order confirmation e-mail is sent and the order is not in the paid state. By activating the transaction update, such transactions can be authorized.

field.label: Level
field.comment: Messages of this or a higher level will be logged.

field.label: Show Payment Id
field.comment: Show the payment id in the order information

field.label: Use Base Currency
field.comment: Send amounts to Datatrans in store's base currency.

field.label: Invoice Settlement
field.comment: Choose settlement after order in case you want an invoice to be created with your oder. The state of the invoice will set according to your capture status. For captured payments, an invoice is always created.

field.label: Send Invoice Email
field.comment: Send the invoice email automatically after invoice creation.

field.label: Customer Address
field.comment: Should the customer address be sent to Datatrans?

field.label: Capturing
field.comment: Should the amount be captured automatically after the order (direct) or should the amount only be reserved (deferred)?

field.label: Credit Card Brands
field.comment: The brand of the credit card is detected by the card number if hidden authorization is used. If the payment page is used, the user has to select the brand. The allowed credit card brands can be restricted by this setting.

field.label: Image Brand Selection
field.comment: The card brand selection is automatically done depending on the entered card number. If no Javascript is active in the browser, a drop down is shown. In case JavaScript a the brand logos can be shown. Should the brand selection using images?

field.label: User Identification
field.comment: This setting controls the user identification for alias manager (one-click checkout) transactions. In case the shipping address is checked and the addresses do not match the CVC the user is forced to reenter all the credit card details.

field.label: IFrame Height
field.comment: This setting controls the height of the integrated iFrame. It is recommended to set this value to at least 400.

field.label: Remember Me
field.comment: This setting creates a checkbox for the user to save their payment information on the Datatrans page / lightbox. The alias feature must be active with Datatrans account and the alias manager must be active in the shop. If the shopping cart already offers a checkbox to save the alias, please do not use this feature, as the user will need to confirm saving twice.

field.label: Authorization Method
field.comment: Select the authorization method to use for processing this payment method.

field.label: Alias Manager
field.comment: The alias manager allows the customer to select from a credit card previously stored. The sensitive data is stored by Datatrans.

field.label: Show Payment Id
field.comment: Show the payment id in the order information

field.label: Use Base Currency
field.comment: Send amounts to Datatrans in store's base currency.

field.label: Invoice Settlement
field.comment: Choose settlement after order in case you want an invoice to be created with your oder. The state of the invoice will set according to your capture status. For captured payments, an invoice is always created.

field.label: Send Invoice Email
field.comment: Send the invoice email automatically after invoice creation.

field.label: Customer Address
field.comment: Should the customer address be sent to Datatrans?

field.label: Capturing
field.comment: Should the amount be captured automatically after the order (direct) or should the amount only be reserved (deferred)?

field.label: CreditPass Purchase Type
field.comment: German ELV transactions can be processed with an integrated credit and address check. The merchant has to agree with CreditPass (Telego) the test rules. The test rule is referred to by a 'Purchase Type'. If you don't want to use this feature, you can leave this field empty.

field.comment: Choose settlement after order in case you want an invoice to be created with your oder. The state of the invoice will set according to your capture status. For captured payments, an invoice is always created.

field.label: Send Invoice Email
field.comment: Send the invoice email automatically after invoice creation.

field.label: Customer Address
field.comment: Should the customer address be sent to Datatrans?

field.label: Capturing
field.comment: Should the amount be captured automatically after the order (direct) or should the amount only be reserved (deferred)?

field.label: IFrame Height
field.comment: This setting controls the height of the integrated iFrame. It is recommended to set this value to at least 400.

field.label: Authorization Method
field.comment: Select the authorization method to use for processing this payment method.

field.label: Alias Manager
field.comment: The alias manager allows the customer to select from a credit card previously stored. The sensitive data is stored by Datatrans.

field.label: Show Payment Id
field.comment: Show the payment id in the order information

field.label: Use Base Currency
field.comment: Send amounts to Datatrans in store's base currency.

field.label: Invoice Settlement
field.comment: Choose settlement after order in case you want an invoice to be created with your oder. The state of the invoice will set according to your capture status. For captured payments, an invoice is always created.

field.label: Send Invoice Email
field.comment: Send the invoice email automatically after invoice creation.

field.label: Processor
field.comment: Please select the processor for this payment method.

field.label: Solvency Check
field.comment: The solvency check can be done at different stages in the checkout process. This setting controls when the check is done.

field.label: Invoice On Delivery
field.comment: Here you can set if the invoice will be sent by you together with the product. In this case Datatrans will provide additional data for printing an ESR slip. This feature must be active with the processor as well as Datatrans. You must then process this data yourself. Only supported by POWERPAY. Otherwise POWERPAY will send the invoice in your stead.

field.label: Capturing
field.comment: Should the amount be captured automatically after the order (direct) or should the amount only be reserved (deferred)?

field.comment: This setting controls the height of the integrated iFrame. It is recommended to set this value to at least 400.

field.label: EasyPay Title
field.comment: Here you can specify the text, which is shown to the customer on the Easypay website. If the text contains the tag {id}, it will be replaced with the order number.

field.label: Invoice Settlement
field.comment: Choose settlement after order in case you want an invoice to be created with your oder. The state of the invoice will set according to your capture status. For captured payments, an invoice is always created.

field.label: Send Invoice Email

field.label: ORG ID
field.comment: ORG ID used for device fingerprint calls. Is supplied by Byjuno. If this is set but the solvency check is set to anything other than 'during the authorization' this will not be used.

field.label: Phone Requirements
field.comment: Here you may configure which phone numbers are required from the customer during checkout process. These fields will always appear, but may be prefilled by values given in earlier steps of the checkout.

field.comment: Should the amount be captured automatically after the order (direct) or should the amount only be reserved (deferred)?
